pageContext.claim: “The Democrats, are saying loud and clear that they do not want to build a Concrete Wall - but we are not building a Concrete Wall, we are building artistically designed steel slats, so that you can easily see through it.”
pageContext.analysis: Democratic opposition to Trump's border wall isn't built on aesthetic disagreements. Rather, they believe the wall would be ineffective at stopping illegal immigration or drug trafficking and a waste of resources — no matter the material used.
